full_summary:
**External Audit Services for AgriStability and AgriInvest**

**Solicitation Info:**
* Solicitation Number: 01R11-25-C005
* Tender Closing Date: 21 May 2024, 13:00:00
* Amendment Number: 4
* Amendment Date: 21 May 2024
* Expected Contract Start Date: 3 June 2024
* Expected Contract End Date: 31 December 2028

**Procurement Information:**
* Procurement Category: SRV (Services)
* Procurement Method: Selective tendering with a competitive bid process
* Selection Criteria: Highest Combined Rating for Technical Merit and Price
* Trade Agreements: Selection firms must be eligible under the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), and Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA).

**Contract Details:**
* Contracting Entity Name: Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada
* Contracting Entity Address: 4-303 Main Street, Winnipeg, MB R3C 3G7
* Regions of Opportunity: Manitoba
* Regions of Delivery: Winnipeg, Manitoba
* Contract Period: The contract period will begin on the date of contract award and end on 31 December 2024. An irrevocable option to extend the contract term by up to four years under the same conditions.

**RFP Details:**
* Tender Description: The Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada, Farm Income Programs Directorate, requires audit services in Winnipeg, Manitoba. The successful firm will provide audit services to support the department's AgriStability and AgriInvest program.

**Eligible Firms:**
The following Supply Arrangement Holders have been invited to submit a proposal:
* Aniko Consultants Inc., Samson & Associates-CMA Consulting Inc., in Joint Venture
* BDO Canada LLP
* Collins Barrow Ottawa LLP
* Deloitte LLP
* Ernst & Young LLP
* KPM
